metadata.title: CVE-2019-9811 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: As part of a winning Pwn2Own entry, a researcher demonstrated a sandbox escape by installing a malicious language pack and then opening a browser feature that used the compromised translation. This vulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 60.8, Firefox < 68, and Thunderbird < 60.8.

notes.note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '68.0+build3-0ubuntu1').
thunderbird package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '60.8.0+build1-0ubuntu1').
